DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1b , open-label , study design examine safety , tolerability , maximum tolerate dose tivozanib ( AV-951 ) FOLFOX6 advance colorectal cancer gastrointestinal cancer . In study , dose tivozanib ( AV-951 ) escalate 0.5 mg/day 1.5 mg/day . All subject receive standard dos FOLFOX6 chemotherapy every 2 week .
